name: Ciudad del Mar
description:
A small game inspired by a short poem written by Federico García Lorca.
The poem can be found here, page 26.

Made for #JamCulturaAbierta during the weekend of November 17-18th 2018.

Music and Sounds by YenTing Lo

Desing, Graphics and Development by Ferran Bertomeu

Play with a mouse.
Play with a mouse with 2 buttons for enhanced experience.

Desktop version has better sound.
